summary: A behind-the-scenes look at the fans who gather by the thousands each year in San Diego, California to attend Comic-Con, the world's largest comic book convention.
cast: Kenneth Branagh|Seth Rogen|Seth Green|Edgar Wright|Thomas Jane|Guillermo del Toro|Kevin Smith|Corey Feldman|Joss Whedon|Eli Roth|Stan Lee|Paul Scheer|Frank Miller|Gerard Way|Adrianne Curry|Matt Groening|Todd McFarlane|Jamison Newlander|Paul Dini|Grant Morrison|Alicia Arden|Holly Conrad|Harry Jay Knowles|Jon Schnepp|Tim Sheridan|Joe Quesada|Mish'al Samman|Michael Bender|Jessica Merizan|Matt Fraction|Scott Mantz|Andrew O. Page|James Darling|Skip Harvey|Mike Carbonaro|Darrin Forsythe|Jamin Fite|Timothy Bradstreet|Scott Rogers|S.K. Darling|Maksim Stoyalov|Kevin Gaussoin|Chuck Rozanski|Steven Seuferer|Eric Henson|Stephenie Werner|Tayler Hudson|Dustin Rachuy|Edgar Gallego|Sean Walsh|Eric Cajiuat|Chris Calilung|Tobias Canto Jr.|Brian Fitzharris|Jen King|Paula Labaredas
title: Comic-Con Episode IV: A Fan's Hope
